name: Das HTML5-Radio
description: A stylesheet for a good standalone app.
css: @-moz-document regexp(".*DasHtml5Radio\.htm"){*{font-family:"ubuntu mono",arial}html{background:radial-gradient(#000 15%,transparent 16%) 0 0 / 16px 16px,radial-gradient(#000 15%,transparent 16%) 8px 8px / 16px 16px,radial-gradient(rgba(255,255,255,.1)15%,transparent 20%) 0 1px / 16px 16px,radial-gradient(rgba(255,255,255,.1)15%,transparent 20%) 8px 9px / 16px 16px,#282828}body{display:flex;flex-flow:column-reverse nowrap;justify-content:center;margin:auto;padding:0 30px;max-width:720px;height:100vh}table{width:100%;border-spacing:0;box-shadow:-5px -15px 20px 20px rgba(0,0,0,.2);border:3px double #3b3e3e;border-top:0;border-radius:0 0 6px 6px;background:radial-gradient(transparent 42%,#1d1d1d 47%) left bottom,linear-gradient(234deg,#3b3e3e 46%,rgba(0,0,0,.6)47%,#545858 54%,#434646 54.5%) left bottom,radial-gradient(transparent 42%,#1d1d1d 47%) right bottom,linear-gradient(142deg,#3b3e3e 46%,rgba(0,0,0,.6)47%,#545858 54%,#434646 54.5%) right bottom}td{padding:20px}td:first-child{padding-right:0;max-width:42px;color:#478598}tr:first-child td{padding-bottom:0}tr:nth-child(2) td{line-height:1}#m3u{padding:0 20px 0 32px;font-size:10px;background:linear-gradient(to right,#1d1d1d 20px,#404343 20px) 0 0 / 22px 100% no-repeat,linear-gradient(to left,#1d1d1d 20px,#404343 20px) right 0 / 22px 100% no-repeat,#161616;color:#238493}#m3u::-moz-selection{background:hsla(0,0%,69%,.3);color:#ffe4e1}#m3u::selection{background:hsla(0,0%,69%,.3);color:#ffebcd}tr:last-child td{padding-top:0}select,textarea{width:100%;border:2px solid #404343;background:#161616}#set,select,textarea:focus{outline:0}select{padding:5px;height:40px;font-size:18px;border-bottom:0;border-radius:4px 4px 0 0;-webkit-appearance:none;color:#4682b4;cursor:pointer}@-moz-document url-prefix(){tr:first-child td:last-child::after{content:"";position:absolute;height:38px;box-sizing:border-box;width:18px;transform:translate(-20px,2px);border-top-right-radius:1.5px;background:#161616}}:-moz-focusring:not(textarea){color:transparent;text-shadow:0 0 0 #4682b4}option{padding:4px 8px;font-size:10px}#set{border:3px double #313434;border-radius:6px;background:linear-gradient(#7c7c7c 10%,#636363 50%);font-weight:700;color:#191919;letter-spacing:1px;cursor:pointer}#set::-moz-focus-inner{border:0}textarea{box-sizing:border-box;margin:0 0 10px;padding:10px 10px 0;height:60px;line-height:1.4em;word-break:break-all;resize:none;font-size:10px;border-top:0;border-radius:0 0 4px 4px;color:#238493}textarea:hover{cursor:pointer}textarea:focus{cursor:text;color:peru}audio{padding:30px 20px 0;width:calc(100% - 46px);border:3px double #3b3e3e;border-bottom:0;border-radius:6px 6px 0 0;cursor:pointer;background:radial-gradient(transparent 42%,#1d1d1d 47%) left top,linear-gradient(160deg,#3b3e3e 46%,rgba(0,0,0,.6)47%,#545858 54%,#434646 54.5%) left top,radial-gradient(transparent 42%,#1d1d1d 47%) right top,linear-gradient(179deg,#3b3e3e 46%,rgba(0,0,0,.6)47%,#545858 54%,#434646 54.5%) right top}audio,table{background-repeat:no-repeat;background-size:25px 25px;background-color:#1d1d1d}#report{position:fixed;right:0;top:0;padding:5px;background:hsla(0,0%,0%,.3);border-bottom-left-radius:4px;color:#b22222}body>div:last-of-type :not(h1){display:none}h1{float:left;margin:0 10px;padding:0 10px;font-size:22px;box-shadow:-6px -1px 6px rgba(0,0,0,.2);border:thin solid #3b3e3e;border-bottom:0;border-radius:6px 6px 0 0;background:#161616;font-weight:400;color:#5f9ea0}}
